sentences.sContent: This lets us see more of the whole picture, look at problems more holistically, and take corrective action sooner.
sentences.sContent_eng: This lets us see more of the whole picture, look at problems more holistically, and take corrective action sooner.
sentences.sCn: 这使得我们可以看到更多的整体画面，更轻松地查看问题，更快地采取适当的行动。

sentences.sContent: Menu items and dialogs, when they are translated, need to be considered holistically. It is important to make sure that translated interfaces remain coherent as a whole.
sentences.sContent_eng: Menu items and dialogs, when they are translated, need to be considered holistically. It is important to make sure that translated interfaces remain coherent as a whole.
sentences.sCn: 在翻译菜单项和对话框时，需要全盘考虑，确保翻译的界面保持整体的一致性很重要。
